SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.net

Class ServerRmiAdapter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.net.ServerRmiAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, OnAchievedCommonGoalListener, OnAchievedPersonalGoalListener, OnAdjacentTilesUpdatedListener, OnAssignedCommonGoalListener, OnAssignedPersonalGoalListener, OnBoardRefilledListener, OnBoardUpdatedListener, OnBookShelfUpdatedListener, OnChangedCommonGoalAvailableScoreListener, OnCurrentPlayerChangedListener, OnExceptionsListener, OnLastPlayerUpdatedListener, OnMessageSentListener, OnPlayersListChangedListener, OnPlayerStateChangedListener, OnPointsUpdatedListener, OnStateChangedListener, OnWinnerChangedListener
public class ServerRmiAdapter extends Object implements ClientInterface
The `ServerRmiAdapter` class is an implementation of the `ClientInterface` and `Closeable` interfaces. It acts as an adapter between the RMI-based client and the server, allowing communication between them. This class handles RMI-specific operations and delegates the actual handling of messages to the `RmiClientInterface`.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
